title: Google accounts on Pixel 4A do not download and open
content:
I just got a Pixel 4A for my Google Fi account this week.  My old phone is a Moto X4.  When setting up the Pixel, I did the hardwire transfer of my Google account, apps, and everything from the Moto to the new Pixel.  

I just noticed today the Gmail won't open PDF files, it says downloading and stays at 0% indefinitely.  Similarly, when I try to download episodes on the Google podcast apps, it starts spinning but doesn't actually download.  With other apps and accounts, I am able to download files, it just seems to be Google accounts.

How do I fix this?
